remarks: The determinant evaluates to an element of the base ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 7-Feb-2019.)
statement:
mdetf.d $e |- D = ( N maDet R ) $.
mdetf.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mdetf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mdetf.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
mdetcl $p |- ( ( R e. CRing /\ M e. B ) -> ( D ` M ) e. K ) $.
